lcap-lucky-draw/width.description: Set the width of the nine-square grid

lcap-lucky-draw/height.description: Set the height of the nine-square grid

lcap-lucky-draw/return_prize.description: The prize information returned by the backend, the respective lottery probabilities are invalid after setting

lcap-lucky-draw/prize_popup.description: Whether to open the default winning pop-up window

lcap-lucky-draw/start_img.description: Set the lottery start button image

lcap-lucky-draw/font_color.description: Set the image color of all prize text

lcap-lucky-draw/font_top_padding.description: Set the distance between the prize text and the top (default: 60px)

lcap-lucky-draw/font_size.description: Set the distance between the prize text and the top (default: 22px)

lcap-lucky-draw/block1_name.description: Set the prize name for grid 1

lcap-lucky-draw/block1_chance.description: Set the probability of winning prize 1

lcap-lucky-draw/block2_name.description: Set the prize name for grid 2

lcap-lucky-draw/block2_chance.description: Set the probability of winning prize 2

lcap-lucky-draw/block3_name.description: Set the prize name for grid 3

lcap-lucky-draw/block3_chance.description: Set the probability of winning prize 3

lcap-lucky-draw/block4_name.description: Set the prize name for grid 4

lcap-lucky-draw/block5_name.description: Set the prize name for grid 5

lcap-lucky-draw/block5_chance.description: Set the probability of winning prize 5

lcap-lucky-draw/block6_name.description: Set the prize name for grid 6

lcap-lucky-draw/block6_chance.description: Set the probability of winning prize 6

lcap-lucky-draw/block7_name.description: Set the prize name for grid 7

lcap-lucky-draw/block7_chance.description: Set the probability of winning prize 7

lcap-lucky-draw/block8_name.description: Set the prize name for grid 8

lcap-lucky-draw/block8_chance.description: Set the probability of winning prize 8
